alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 8:10AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lauderdale and northwestern Colbert Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 809 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Pickwick Landing State Park to Corinth. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Killen, Cherokee, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Waterloo and Malone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
